Class PointDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataAccess.DatabaseManager
      • dataAccess.PointDB

  • public class PointDB
extends DatabaseManager
    Retrieves geographic data from the database and converts them into Points of Interest
    Author:
    Jasmin Wellnitz

        latitude - latitude of the specified initial position
